```{r setup}
library(modelCathRes)
```

# View cathode resistance for each pot

```{r plotCathodeResistance}
data("resCathData")
d <- resCathData
head(d)
```

```{r plotCathRes, include=TRUE, fig.dim=c(8, 8)}
modelCathRes::plotCathRes(d, cod_cuve, agebsq, rucv, ncol = 3) +
  ggplot2::labs(title = "Evolution of Cathode Resistance per pot")
```
